body:
- Mark redundant python-magic package
- Add dependencies on the `file` package: note that these libraries import `libmagic.{so,dylib,dll}` at runtime rather than calling the `file` command, so not all external installations of `file` will work here!
- Add compressor dependencies to `file`; previously it was linking against system compression libraries rather than spack ones.
title: file and python dependents: add missing dependencies
